imdb.plot outline: Ke Wei, a celebrity musician takes a break to find inspiration for his next album after an entire year of concert touring in China. Xiao Hui, a fashion blogger tours the world with a little crystal rabbit. They meet at the The Westin Paris and stars shine despite a comedic misunderstanding. Watch romance blossom between the two lovebirds and see how a scandal forces Ke Wei to make a decision that will change his life forever.
imdb.title: Wish Upon a Star (Xing Yuan Tong Xing)
akas: Wish Upon a Star (Xing Yuan Tong Xing) (China)
plot: Ke Wei, a celebrity musician takes a break to find inspiration for his next album after an entire year of concert touring in China. Xiao Hui, a fashion blogger tours the world with a little crystal rabbit. They meet at the The Westin Paris and stars shine despite a comedic misunderstanding. Watch romance blossom between the two lovebirds and see how a scandal forces Ke Wei to make a decision that will change his life forever.::Starwoodmadeforchina
